messages.content: This information pertains to the Scheme for Autonomous Program (With Effect from 2023-2024).
What is the examination scheme for the course ADC303?
For ADC303, Data Structure, the examination scheme includes 20 marks for internal assessment, 20 marks for term work, and 60 marks for the end semester exam.
How many contact hours are there for ADC304, Digital Logic & Computer Architecture?
ADC304 has 3 theory contact hours.
Is there a lab for ADC305, Computer Networks and Operating Systems?
Yes, there is a lab for ADC305.
Can you provide details about the teaching scheme for the course ADL301?
ADL301, Data Structure Lab, has 2 practical contact hours.
Thank you.
You're welcome!
This information pertains to Engineering Mathematics-III (ADC301).
What are the prerequisites for ADC301?
The prerequisites for ADC301 are Engineering Mathematics-I and Engineering Mathematics-II.
Can you explain the course objectives of ADC301?
The objectives include building a strong foundation in mathematics and preparing students for multi-disciplinary projects.
What are the learning outcomes of ADC301?
Upon completion, students will be able to apply Laplace transform, solve Fourier series, and evaluate complex variable functions, among other skills.
How many contact hours does ADC301 have?
ADC301 has 8 hours of teaching for Laplace Transform and 6 hours for Inverse Laplace Transform.
What is the term work evaluation for ADC301?
The term work assessment includes tutorials, assignments, viva, and mini-projects based on the syllabus.
Thank you.
You're welcome!
This information pertains to Discrete Structures and Graph Theory (ADC302).
What are the course objectives of ADC302?
The objectives include cultivating clear thinking, understanding mathematical proofs, and applying graph theory to solve practical problems.
What are the learning outcomes of ADC302?
Upon completion, students will be able to reason logically, understand relations and functions, and analyze complex computing problems using discrete mathematics principles.
How many contact hours does ADC302 have?
ADC302 has 6 hours of teaching for Logic and 6 hours for Relations and Functions.
What is the term work evaluation for ADC302?
The term work assessment includes tutorials, assignments, and group discussions, among other activities.
Thank you.
You're welcome!
